org.jasig.cas.support.rest

Class TicketsResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jasig.cas.support.rest.TicketsResource

  • @RestController(value="ticketResourceRestController")
public class TicketsResource
extends java.lang.Object
    RestController implementation of CAS' REST API. This class implements main CAS RESTful resource for vending/deleting TGTs and vending STs:
    • POST /v1/tickets
    • POST /v1/tickets/{TGT-id}
    • DELETE /v1/tickets/{TGT-id}
    Since:
    4.1.0
